DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to examine whether electronic compliance monitoring in real time could offer some advantages compared to normal electronic monitoring in opioid substitution treatment. The investigators would also like know whether this method could enable the quick detection of possible problems in medication intakes and/or prevent the abuse or diversion of substitution medications.
DOC.brief_title: Compliance Monitoring in Real Time During Opioid Substitution Treatment
DOC.criteria: Opiate dependence Suboxone treatment Stable substitution medication dose Chaotic situation in life
